# NSParagraphStyle.TextTabType.decimalTabStopType

**Case**

A tab stop that aligns columns of numbers to each number’s decimal point.

## Declaration

```swift
case decimalTabStopType
```

## Constants

- **NSParagraphStyle.TextTabType.leftTabStopType**: A left-aligned tab stop.
- **NSParagraphStyle.TextTabType.rightTabStopType**: A right-aligned tab stop.
- **NSParagraphStyle.TextTabType.centerTabStopType**: A center-aligned tab stop.
title: NSParagraphStyle.TextTabType.decimalTabStopType
